header.title: snmpa_notification_delivery_info_receiver

erlref.modulesummary: Behaviour module for the SNMP agent notification delivery information receiver.

description.p: This module defines the behaviour of the notification delivery information receiver.
A snmpa_notification_delivery_info_receiver compliant module must export the following functions:
The semantics of them and their exact signatures are explained below.

desc.p: This is the first function called when a notification delivery is in progress. It informs the receiver which targets will get the notification. The result of the delivery will be provided via successive calls to delivery_info/4 function, see below.
This function is called for each target in the Targets argument of the delivery_targets/3 function, see above.
The purpose is to inform the receiver of the result of the delivery (was the notification acknowledged or not) for each target.
